platform.core.profile.category.notifications=Notificacions notifications.filters.cancel=Cancel·lar notifications.filters.submit=Desa notifications.filters.type.label=Tipus de filtre: ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.hint=How the filter should act towards an event in the given location notifications.filters.location.label=Àmbit de filtre: ### Missing: notifications.filters.location.hint=What part of the wiki should be concerned by the filter?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=Opcions avançades de filtratge ### Missing: notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=These filters are activated by default, you can disable them by using the button next to each filter. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=Nom del filtre notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=Descripció notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=Commuta notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=Tanca

Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.saving=Your settings are being saved... ### Missing: notifications.settings.saved=Saved! ### Missing: notifications.settings.savingfailed=Failed to save your settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter=Add filter ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled.
